item.title: Youtube Tutorial Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a Youtube Tutorial Video Creator to join our team. As a video creator,  Your Job will be to Record screen, Do voice over and simple edit. You will be provided by Topic , Rest you have to do research of the  solution. and make videos.

20-30 videos per week
1-3 mins video
$1 per video
Good English

Attach your tutorial video samples with your own  voice over. (Note- If no samples attached, you won't be considered)
(Apply only If you agree with the pricing mentioned above in the description)
Thank You.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 14, 2024 12:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Country: India

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I have several channels on Facebook and am looking for an editor/channel manager. I'm looking for an experienced writer to produce content in English on Facebook on topics around the NFL and NBA. I'm looking for a profile with some experience in the sports niche. The task will be to edit the video from a supplied script and apply subtitles using the subtitling application I'm paying for. The videos to be produced will last between 3 and 5 minutes.  You will be asked to produce 2 videos per day, for a total of 60 videos for the month. Please send me your portfolio and references for this job. Thank you






Budget: $500
Posted On: June 14, 2024 11:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Eye contact video - Upwork
item.description:
I need people to film eye-practising videos of themselves.

You'll basically have to film a video of yourself looking at the camera for 5 minutes

EASY WORK - $10 + 5 star review on Upwork

Become a part of the project that helps people get rid of social anxiety

***Details:
Video example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5w3cYtJekpw

- High-quality high-resolution video (need to have good smartphone or camera)
- You shouldn’t be too far in video (only head and neck should be visible)
- Horizontal video
- Minimum 5 minutes long
- Camera should be stable and at eye level (not from below or above)
- From time to time gently smile, tilt your head or lift eyebrow (do these naturally), don’t forget to blink
- You can film indoors or outdoors
- Sounds on

Interested? Film a trial 15-20 seconds video to see if it looks good


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 14, 2024 11:54 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Data Entry, Virtual Assistance
Skills: Data Entry, Virtual Assistance
Country: Lithuania
click to apply

item.title: Course Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented individual to assist in the creation of an online course. The successful candidate will have expertise in course development and a proven track record of creating engaging and informative content. The responsibilities of this role include designing and organizing course materials, creating video lectures and presentations, and implementing interactive elements to enhance the learning experience. The ideal candidate will possess strong communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently. Experience with e-learning platforms and instructional design principles is highly desirable.

Relevant skills:

- Course development
- Content creation
- Video editing
- Instructional design
- E-learning platforms
- Strong communication skills

Hourly Range: $3.00-$4.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 11:51 UTC
Category: Graphic Design

item.title: Seeking Talented Short Form Video Editor for YouTube Content - Upwork
item.description:
We are in search of a skilled Short Form Video Editor to join our team. Our ideal candidate is creative, detail-oriented, and proficient in editing engaging short videos for various social media platforms such as TikTok, and YouTube Shorts

Responsibilities

- Edit and produce high-quality short form videos (45-59 seconds) tailored for social media platforms.
- Implement creative transitions, effects, and graphics to enhance video content.
- Collaborate with our team to understand the vision and style of each project.
- Ensure videos are optimized for social media algorithms and audience engagement.
- Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines consistently

Requirements

- Proven experience in short form video editing with a portfolio of previous work.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
- Strong understanding of social media trends, formats, and best practices.
- Ability to add text, animations, and other visual elements to videos.
- Excellent attention to detail and a creative mindset.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work independently

Preferred Skills

- Experience with motion graphics and animation.
- Knowledge of color grading and sound design.
- Familiarity with creating content that aligns with brand aesthetics and messaging.

Application Process

Please submit your portfolio or samples of your previous work

Budget

- $300

Location

-Remote

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 14, 2024 11:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Animation, Audio Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Color Grading, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Animation, Audio Editing, Video Intro & Outro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Thumbnail Artist In The Bodycam Niche - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!
We're looking for a creative YouTube Thumbnail Artist to join our team. If you have experience designing eye-catching thumbnails, especially in the bodycam niche, this could be the perfect gig for you!

What We're Looking For:
- Experience: You should know how to create thumbnails that grab attention and make viewers want to click. Familiarity with the bodycam niche is a plus.
- Availability: We have three channels, so there's plenty of work to go around. If you're good, we can offer you lots of projects.
- Skills: Quick turnaround times are essential. We also value eagerness to learn, as we will help you get the hang of our specific style.

In order for you to properly understand the style of thumbnail that we are looking for, we've attached some channels that use the style that we are interested in:
https://www.youtube.com/@DrInsanityCrime/videos
https://www.youtube.com/@X-Cop
https://www.youtube.com/@DetectiveWilliams/videos
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6wvxxHKW8KEnStASykvUbw


What We Offer:
- Flexible Hours: Work when it suits you. We're flexible as long as you meet deadlines.
- Negotiable Pay: Your rate will depend on the quality and consistency of your work. We're willing to negotiate to find a rate that works for both of us.

How to Apply:
- Show us some of your previous work with YouTube thumbnails.
- Tell us a bit about your experience with designing and why you think you'd be a great fit.
- We have this document created to help you make a sample to attach in your application. Please note that samples following the guidelines of number 3, 4 and 5 are preferred: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MzP2dt8xLth4xZhHfOP0XuQE-jUDNR69dDRkFbdX95A/edit#heading=h.fn1lcuro7w5h

If you're passionate about creating awesome visuals and want to be part of a growing team, we'd love to hear from you!

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions. We're excited to see what you can do! Please remember, people who submit a sample according to the document above will be our priority

Note: Make sure your application is simple, straightforward, and showcases your best work. We welcome artists from all backgrounds and look forward to seeing your creativity in action!

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 14, 2024 11:26 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Thumbnail, Graphic Design, YouTube Thumbnail
Skills: Thumbnail, Graphic Design, YouTube Thumbnail
Country: Cyprus
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Shorts Editor In The Bodycam Niche - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!
We're looking for a talented YouTube Shorts editor to join our team. If you have experience editing Shorts and a good sense of what keeps viewers watching, this could be the perfect gig for you!

What We're Looking For:
- Experience: You should know how to create engaging YouTube Shorts. Understanding viewer retention is key – we need content that keeps people hooked.
- Availability: We have three channels, so there's plenty of work to go around. If you're good, we can offer you lots of projects.
- Skills: Quick turnaround times are essential. We also value eagerness to learn, as we will help you get the hang of our specific style.

What We Offer:
- Flexible Hours: Work when it suits you. We're flexible as long as you meet deadlines.
- Negotiable Pay: Your rate will depend on the quality and consistency of your work. We're willing to negotiate to find a rate that works for both of us.

How to Apply:
- Show us some of your previous work with YouTube Shorts.
- Tell us a bit about your experience with editing and why you think you'd be a great fit.
- We've made this document explaining the style that we are looking for in more detail. It also includes instructions for a sample video that we would highly appreciate if you attach to you application: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SRYdvU9zPs2ZtqC-XLr7BeC_4pI6K9euaLL7fO9OPvQ/edit

If you're passionate about creating awesome content and want to be part of a growing team, we'd love to hear from you! Please note that applications including the sample from our Google Docs will be our first priority

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions. We're excited to see what you can do!

Note: Make sure your application is simple, straightforward, and showcases your best work. We welcome editors from all backgrounds and look forward to seeing your creativity in action!

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 14, 2024 11:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Production, Short Video
Skills: YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Production, Short Video
Country: Cyprus
click to apply

item.title: Hiring A YouTube Video Editor ($400+ Per Month) - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are hiring an editor for our YouTube Channel. This job will require you to do the following:

Create Engaging Content Based Off The Script & Voice Over We Will Provide

Create 2-3 Videos Per Week

Be Able To Replicate The Quality Of Content As The Examples Below

Please check out some of the videos on these channels to verify you can match the quality of the content we are looking for before applying for this job.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ArrOpOpd-qs&t=44s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ewLpXw6uN28

https://www.youtube.com/@Kelevins

We are paying $50+ per video for this job, so we are looking for a well-seasoned editor who has experience with making these styles of videos. We are looking to hire someone who can make consistent videos per month for our channel. if you have read through this entire job post please begin your cover letter with the word "blue". All other applicants will be excluded. Please do not apply if you are not happy with the FEE!

Budget: $50

item.title: Social Media/Blog Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a talented and creative Social Media Content Creator to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for producing engaging and viral content for our brand across all social media platforms. This includes creating high-quality videos, promotional pictures, retargeting videos, articles with images and videos, and ad copies. Additionally, they will have the ability to leverage tools like ChatGPT to enhance content creation and strategy.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and create viral content and videos for various social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, etc.).
Design and produce high-quality promotional pictures to support marketing campaigns.
Create retargeting videos aimed at converting and re-engaging our audience.
Write engaging articles with accompanying images and videos to enhance content reach.
Develop compelling ad copies for social media campaigns.
Utilize ChatGPT to generate creative content ideas, draft articles, and create engaging ad copies.
Collaborate with the marketing team to align content with brand messaging and campaign goals.
Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends and viral content strategies.
Analyze content performance and make data-driven recommendations for improvements.
Ensure all content is consistent with brand guidelines and meets the highest quality standards.

Qualifications:
Proven experience in creating viral content for social media.
Proficiency in video editing software and graphic design tools.
Strong understanding of social media platforms and their algorithms.
Excellent storytelling and creative skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong attention to detail and a passion for staying current with digital trends.
Experience with retargeting strategies and tools is a plus.
Strong writing skills and experience in creating engaging articles and ad copies.
Familiarity with AI tools like ChatGPT to enhance content creation.

Why Join Us:
Be part of a dynamic and innovative team.
Opportunity to work on exciting projects with a high potential for viral success.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Room for growth and professional development.

Skills: MP4, Video Commercial, AI-Generated Video, Testimonial Video, Explainer Video, Short Video Ad, TikTok Video, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Blog Writing, Content Writing, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Content, SEO Writing, Content Strategy, Creative Writing, Facebook

item.content:encoded:
Job Description:

We are looking for a talented and creative Social Media Content Creator to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for producing engaging and viral content for our brand across all social media platforms. This includes creating high-quality videos, promotional pictures, retargeting videos, articles with images and videos, and ad copies. Additionally, they will have the ability to leverage tools like ChatGPT to enhance content creation and strategy.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and create viral content and videos for various social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, etc.).
Design and produce high-quality promotional pictures to support marketing campaigns.
Create retargeting videos aimed at converting and re-engaging our audience.
Write engaging articles with accompanying images and videos to enhance content reach.
Develop compelling ad copies for social media campaigns.
Utilize ChatGPT to generate creative content ideas, draft articles, and create engaging ad copies.
Collaborate with the marketing team to align content with brand messaging and campaign goals.
Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends and viral content strategies.
Analyze content performance and make data-driven recommendations for improvements.
Ensure all content is consistent with brand guidelines and meets the highest quality standards.

Qualifications:
Proven experience in creating viral content for social media.
Proficiency in video editing software and graphic design tools.
Strong understanding of social media platforms and their algorithms.
Excellent storytelling and creative skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong attention to detail and a passion for staying current with digital trends.
Experience with retargeting strategies and tools is a plus.
Strong writing skills and experience in creating engaging articles and ad copies.
Familiarity with AI tools like ChatGPT to enhance content creation.

Why Join Us:
Be part of a dynamic and innovative team.
Opportunity to work on exciting projects with a high potential for viral success.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Room for growth and professional development.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 14, 2024 11:11 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Video Commercial, AI-Generated Video, Testimonial Video, Explainer Video, Short Video Ad, TikTok Video, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Blog Writing, Content Writing, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Content, SEO Writing, Content Strategy, Creative Writing, Facebook
Skills: MP4, Video Commercial, AI-Generated Video, Testimonial Video, Explainer Video, Short Video Ad, TikTok Video, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Social Media Content Creation, Blog Writing, Content Writing, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Content, SEO Writing, Content Strategy, Creative Writing, Facebook

item.description:
Job Posting: Fitness Niche Shorts Video Editor
Position: Shorts Video Editor
Category: Fitness Niche Shorts Editing
Commitment: 30 Shorts per month

Deadline: Earliest Possible ( Less than 24 Hours )

Description:

We are seeking a talented video editor to produce high-quality and engaging short videos for our fitness niche. The ideal candidate will be able to create content that aligns with our style and the client's preferences.

Responsibilities:

Edit 30 short videos per month
Create engaging content that adheres to the fitness niche
Follow the client's preferred caption style
Maintain a clean and straightforward editing style without complex graphics.

Trial Video:

To evaluate your skills, please edit the following trial video: Trial Video

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1evxIOWsSSyJzu1CnNX7gyWIErRtqKEDr/view)
Client's Reference:

The client prefers the caption style shown in this video: Client's Reference Video

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8EwEY8uXsL/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link

YouTube Portfolio- https://youtu.be/nvP_j_0XNl8
Instagram Portfolio- https://www.instagram.com/alidubaiathletics/

Requirements:

1. Combine the reference style with the mentioned portfolios.
2. Ensure edits are engaging and suitable for the fitness niche without overly complex graphics.

Join us in creating dynamic and captivating fitness content!

item.title: Testimonials video shoot - Summerville, SC, USA - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,
We're looking for a videographer for a testimonial shoot in - Teaneck, NJ, USA
July 9th, 2024 - 9AM local time
PLEASE READ THE PDF ATTACHED.

1 hour prep
3.5 hours video testimonial shoot + b-rolls on site

We will provide all the information you may need - name, phone number and address.

Please take a close look at the filming guideline attached.

The interviews will have to be live on ZOOM so we can hear and see everything live and able to direct also.

Equipment wise - Camera Sony A7S or better, sound recording equipment, a little bit of lights.

After shooting deliver all the material at the same day via Internet.

We think 1 person is enough for this job, we will talk and coordinate everything, you will do the interview and receive from us the questions you need to ask and what are the key answers that we need for the video.

For the testimonials - 1 Angel of shooting is enough, but shoot it in 4K so we can cut it on editing.

Thank you.

Budget: $850
Posted On: June 14, 2024 10:57 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Photography, Video Production, Cinematography, Testimonial Video
Skills: Videography, Photography, Video Production, Cinematography, Testimonial Video
Country: Israel

item.title: Podcast Reels Shorts Editor - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Title: Podcast Reel Shorts Editor**

**About Us:**
We feature inspiring stories from individuals in Dubai who have achieved their dreams, aiming to educate, entertain, and motivate our audience.

**Job Description:**
We seek a creative Podcast Reel Shorts Editor to transform our podcast episodes into engaging short reels for social media. You'll use "Opus Clips" to highlight key moments, ensuring each reel aligns with our style.

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Edit and produce short reels from podcast episodes.
- Use "Opus Clips" to highlight engaging content.
- Incorporate text overlays, graphics, and captions.
- Optimize reels for Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and YouTube.
- Collaborate with the production team.

**Requirements:**
- Experience in video editing for social media.
- Proficiency with "Opus Clips" and video editing software.
- Understanding of social media trends.
- Strong attention to detail and creativity.
- Excellent communication and time management skills.
- Portfolio showcasing relevant work.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience with podcast content.
- Knowledge of Dubai's cultural landscape.

**Example Links:**
Refer to the following for our desired style:
- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7RKS9qi9_u/?igsh=MTd3Nmp6YWNlOXB3dA==

- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7CUoVigxU1/?igsh=Y20xbHZlY3ZlNHFw

- https://www.instagram.com/reel/C4qQ9tRpXnl/?igsh=MW5nMTZvMDQxNmpjbQ==

Pay per reel:
Since the reels will come from already edited podcast episodes, your task will be to spice it up and therefore the payment per reel short is 10-15 dollars with each podcast expected to have 5 - 8 reels being produced.

Join us in creating compelling content that inspires and connects with audiences worldwide!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 14, 2024 10:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to turn our two-camera videos into engaging YouTube content for our clients. Each clip is no longer than 10 minutes and requires expert editing to enhance the overall quality and storytelling. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing software and a keen eye for detail. They should be able to work independently, follow specific instructions, and deliver high-quality videos within the given timeframe. This role requires creativity, efficiency, and the ability to meet deadlines.
  Skills required:
  - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.)
  - Strong knowledge of video formats and encoding
  - Attention to details and storytelling abilities
  - Experience in color grading and audio editing
  - Ability to work with multiple camera angles
  - Good communication skills to understand client requirements

We will have 1-3 seporate videos each week.
Could you let me know roughly how much time you think each video will take. All I'm after is cuts between the two cameras. It's a novice asking a expert how a product works and them explaining its features and benefits.
This will go on YouTube but also used for the product listing's on their website.
Most clips will be 3-7 minutes long, but up to 10.
Ideally have the video 1st draft back within 3 days and option for re working it.
Any help on that front would be greatfull recieved.

  If you are a talented video editor who is passionate about creating impactful YouTube content, we want to hear from you!


Hourly Range: $5.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 14, 2024 10:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Thumbnail Editor for Healthygamergg-style Thumbnails - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented thumbnail editor to create engaging and eye-catching thumbnails similar to those used by healthygamergg. (Graphics that are simple yet provoke pain points) Each edit will be paid at a rate of $5 per thumbnail. I post 1-3 longform videos a weekThe ideal candidate should have expertise in graphic design and the ability to create thumbnails that capture attention, engage curiosity, and drive viewership. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this role.

My niche is a dietitian that supports people with binge eating recovery.

***Please create a thumbnail in the style of HealthygamerGG to any of my videos in BingeDietitian Youtube Channel and email me your results to BingeDietitain at gmail com
Depending on your creation, I will hire you. I do not accept 'just showing portfolios'***

  Skills required:
  - Graphic design
  - Adobe Photoshop
  - Image editing
  - Attention to detail
  - Creativity

  This is a medium-sized project and this can be a full time opportunity. The selected candidate will work closely with our content team to understand the brand's aesthetic and create thumbnails that align with our target audience's interests.



Budget: $5
Posted On: June 14, 2024 10:10 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Videographer Needed for Event in London on July 2nd - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to capture our MadFest event in London, United Kingdom on July 2nd, 2024, who has easy access to the London Centrum / Old  Truman Brewery area. The videographer will be responsible for recording high-quality event footage, including presentations, interviews, and highlights. There will be walk & talk, some moving around, and we will need plenty of b-rolls and a stationed setup for the few interview and presentation sessions. We need the videographer for 5 hours between 10:00-15:00.

Skills required:
- Proficient in operating professional cameras and equipment
- Experience in capturing live events and interviews
- Experience with fast environments, moving traffic, and mobile shooting abilities.
- Attention to detail and ability to work under tight deadlines

This is a medium-sized project that will last for one day only. We expect the videographer to be available for the entire duration of the event.

Expertise level: Intermediate

Please provide samples of your previous work and your availability for July 2nd, 2024. We look forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 14, 2024 10:08 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Camera, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Videography, Camera, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Shorts Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled YouTube Shorts editor to create 20 shorts from screen video recordings of websites.

The shorts are from screen video recordings of websites to compete against https://youtube.com/shorts/ldPCRpVXq08?si=gMKlGIT37IAk2nJI

This job entails: sourcing footage (screen recording), scripting, and voice-over (you can use elevenlabs for this).

100% faceless. Only screen recording.

The ideal candidate will have experience in editing videos specifically for YouTube Shorts and a keen eye for detail. This project requires proficiency in video editing software and a strong understanding of YouTube's content guidelines. The editor must be able to enhance the video recordings, add text overlays, and optimize the shorts for maximum engagement. Attention to pacing, transitions, and visual effects is crucial. If you have a creative mindset and can deliver high-quality YouTube Shorts that captivate viewers, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 14, 2024 10:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: Kenya
click to apply

item.title: Anime Recap video editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a professional anime recap video editor who is proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro. You will need to watch the anime and edit recaps that are engaging.

Requirements:

- Proven work history with evidence of working with channels. Do not claim to have worked with big channels if you cannot provide proof.
- Willingness to edit a few minutes of recaps as a test due to the prevalence of stolen portfolios.
- You must share the project files along with the final video.
- Expertise in keeping the audience engaged.


Payment:
- Starting pay: $0.75 per minute (can discuss if your edit is professional and engaging).

Application Instructions:

- Include the word "recap" in your proposal; otherwise, it will not be viewed.

Terms:

- If you do not agree with any of the given terms, please do not apply.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 14, 2024 09:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Anime, Manga
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Anime, Manga
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Become a Wig Model: Capture Stunning Looks with Real Hair Wigs - Upwork
item.description:
We need to hire a few real hair wig enthusiasts on Upwork to help us showcase the wearability and styling of our wigs through photos and video content.

ä¸.Requirements for the models:

1-Passionate about wearing real hair wigs and regularly wear wigs in their daily life.
2-Photogenic and able to showcase our wigs in their best state, with a focus on highlighting the fashion aspect of our wigs to entice potential buyers.
3-Able to provide high-resolution photos and videos.

äº.We need the following content:

-High-resolution photos of the wig being worn, including front, side, and back views.
-A 30-second high-definition video showcasing the wig and styling options.


Budget: $200
Posted On: June 14, 2024 09:51 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Fashion & Beauty, Photography, Photo Editing, Model & Live Subject Photography, Graphic Design
Skills: Fashion & Beauty, Photography, Photo Editing, Model & Live Subject Photography, Graphic Design
